name: Explorers Demise
description:
You are a very curious lad that has managed to enter into a radiated town that has been bombed 10 years ago, you dodged the soldiers that are keeping people away from this town and now you have to explore the town and see what really happened to it. Oh and dont worry, im sure you wont find any scary monsters in there hahahhh yeah. Turn up your volume, and the expirience will be better with headphones.

(any asset in the game was not created by me, only some voice recordings but thats it all i did was combie these assets into a horror game)
